name: Kool-Bert
description:
Two players race to reach the top of the level. Don't fall off and be sure to avoid the spikes! When a player wins, the game closes automatically.

This is a game I made for the Duplicade gamejam.
Music was created by Brother Android and the Kool*Bert logo was created by David09. Otherwise, the game was made all by me (and a bunch of snippets of C# I smooshed together from the internet). This is the first time I've made a complete game almost entirely by myself, so it was quite a learning experience.

If this game amused you at all, follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TroysNoize

Thanks!
